user_query: I'm organizing a company event and we want to offset our carbon emissions. Calculate the CO2e in Kg from a travel by car for a distance of 500 km using a SmallDieselCar. Can you also fetch the URL for all available medical guidelines to ensure the safety of our employees during the event?

TaskList.description: Calculate the CO2e emissions in Kg for a travel distance of 500 km using a SmallDieselCar.
Fetch the URL for all available medical guidelines for event safety.
